name: translation-hub
description: Translate text between languages using configurable translation providers. Supports language detection, batch translation, and multiple provider backends.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: translation_hub
toolDefinition.description: Translate text between languages. Supports translation, language detection, batch translation, and listing supported languages.

action.description: translate (single text), detect (identify language), batch (translate multiple texts), languages (list supported)

text.description: Text to translate or detect language of

texts.description: Array of texts for batch translation

from.description: Source language code (ISO 639-1, e.g. 'en'). Use 'auto' for detection.
